interactions.flavorLineOne: Once you have proven yourself worthy of the prophecy, bring it to the Infinite Forge.
Brother Vance thanks you for defeating the unbelievers on Mercury.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Brother Vance thanks you for defeating the unbelievers on Mercury.
headerDisplayProperties.name: FLASHPOINT: MERCURY

interactions.flavorLineOne: Saint-14 died a hero, but he also died alone. It is essential that Guardians lean into each others' strengths.
Select another Heroic adventure token to continue defending the Infinite Forest.
Osiris wrote his Lost Prophecies on these six-sided tablets, and hid within them a secret for the Guardian whose deeds he foresaw.
Osiris wrote his Lost Prophecies on these six-sided tablets, and hid within them a secret for the Guardian whose deeds he foresaw.
Saint-14 died a hero, but he also died alone. It is essential that Guardians lean into each others' strengths.
Acquire daily adventure tokens from Brother Vance to complete Mercury adventures and help Osiris protect the Infinite Forest.
Saint-14 was the first Vanguard Commander. Lost for decades, he is still a legend among Guardians. If he returns, his presence will have a huge and very positive impact.
Panoptes is gone, but much of the Forest is still under Vex control. Help Osiris protect the Infinite Forest and thwart new Vex stratagems by taking on Mercury adventures.
Choose a Heroic adventure to face an even more challenging simulation in the Infinite Forest. You may undertake each Heroic adventure once per twice-weekly reset.
Saint-14 was the first Vanguard Commander. Lost for decades, he is still a legend among Guardians. If he returns, his presence will have a huge and very positive impact.
Complete various activities around Mercury, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic Adventures.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Complete various activities around Mercury, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic Adventures.
headerDisplayProperties.name: FLASHPOINT: MERCURY

interactions.flavorLineOne: Complete adventures, challenges, patrols, and public events on Mercury to get Simulation Seeds and earn rewards from Brother Vance.
Your reputation among the Followers of Osiris precedes you. Take this reward in recognition of your deeds.
Show Brother Vance proof of your deeds on Mercury.
Increase your level to claim these rewards.
